subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya  has happily become something of a torchbearer for Nascar, the good-old-boy sport that is trying to extend its reach outside the United States.
snippet: Juan Pablo Montoya  has happily become something of a torchbearer for Nascar, the good-old-boy sport that is trying to extend its reach outside the United States.
